item.title: Nicole add a quote by Charles M. Schulz
item.description: "Sometimes I lie awake at night and I ask, "Is life a multiple choice test or is it a true or false test?" ...Then a voice comes to me out of the dark and says, "We hate to tell you this but life is a thousand word essay." -- Charles M. Schulz

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Charles M. Schulz
item.description: "Why can't we get all the people together in the world that we really like and then just stay together? I guess that wouldn't work. Someone would leave. Someone always leaves. Then we would have to say good-bye. I hate good-byes. I know what I need. I need more hellos." -- Charles M. Schulz
